about_the_game:
Hoop Fighters is a multiplayer and no-rule basketball game with cartoon-style graphics.
You can create your team and beat your friends or other players and knock over their hoops!



Hoop Fighters is a rule-free basketball game that supports up to 6 players (3vs3). In the game, you can do whatever you want, and you never break any rules. Your only goal is making scores.
You can tackle or slap your opponents to steal the ball from the opposing team. With its non-stop gameplay, don't forget to get back to the ball after making a score.



In Hoop Fighters, you can create a character style that best represents you. Build your unique character with various features such as hair, beard, eyes, and more!


Each new game is an opportunity to showcase your skills and endless fun. Take your place in the most rule-free and fun basketball game, beat your opponents.

Don't forget to WISHLIST so you don't miss out on the fun.

short_description: Knock your friends down to the ground and destroy their hoops! Hoop Fighters is an online basketball game for up to 6 players, free from rules. Create your character and join the game. Trip up or slap opponents, do whatever it takes to grab the ball. Remember, there are no rules in Hoop Fighters!
